column1: '''Lenglinn''' is a character created specifically for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]''. He was a [[Rangers of the North
column2: Ranger of the North]] and part of [[Aragorn
column3: Aragorn's]] company that helped protect the Hobbits in [[Buckland]], specifically [[Mr. Underhill]].<ref>{{VGC
